textboxes.description: Em takes a sip from a water bottle she found in the camper. Almost instantly, a strange sensation washes over her. Colors intensify, and the walls begin to shimmer. Bubba, noticing her distress, looks concerned. 'Em, you alright?' he asks.

choices.text: Tell Bubba that something feels off
Try to ignore the feeling and focus

textboxes.description: Em explains the odd sensations to Bubba. He nods understandingly, looking at the bottle with suspicion. 'That water might be… tainted. I’ll help you through it,' he says calmly.

choices.text: Ask Bubba to keep talking to you to keep grounded
Attempt to calm down by observing the surroundings

skill_check.fail: The surroundings start to distort, and everything appears to melt. It’s overwhelming.

textboxes.description: Em tries to shake off the strange feeling, but the colors around her begin to intensify. The world bends and twists, making it difficult to focus.

choices.text: Lie down and close your eyes, hoping it passes

textboxes.description: Bubba starts talking to Em, his voice a steady anchor in a sea of colors and shapes. 'Remember, it’s all just in your mind. Focus on my voice,' he says.

skill_check.fail: Bubba’s voice starts to sound distant, almost echoing. Em feels herself slipping away into the hallucinations.

choices.text: Try to laugh it off, thinking it’s just a trip

textboxes.description: Em attempts to ground herself by focusing on her surroundings, but the more she looks, the more things seem to come alive. The walls breathe, and patterns dance around her.

choices.text: Panic and ask Bubba for help
Embrace the experience and see where it leads

textboxes.description: Lying down, Em closes her eyes, but instead of calming down, a kaleidoscope of colors fills her mind. The patterns seem to pulse to the beat of her heart.

skill_check.fail: The colors spin faster, leaving Em feeling even more disoriented and out of control.

textboxes.description: Em focuses on Bubba’s voice, and slowly the intensity of the colors fades. The world begins to settle, and she feels a sense of calm.
Em laughs, finding humor in the surreal shapes and colors around her. Bubba chuckles, too, and his presence helps her feel grounded and less overwhelmed.
Em surrenders to the hallucinations, exploring the strange world her mind creates. She begins to lose track of time, drifting deeper into the visions.
Em controls her breathing, slowing her heart rate and easing the intensity of the colors. Gradually, the hallucinations become less overwhelming.
